data.name: InviteChangePermissions.InvitedToChangePermissions
data.value: {0} {1} has invited you to change your account permission. This means you’ll be able to submit packaging data to the environmental regulator, on behalf of {2}.

data.name: InviteChangePermissions.YouNeedToAccept
data.value: You need to accept this invitation and give us some more information.

data.name: InviteChangePermissions.ItCanTakeUpTo
data.value: It can take up to 28 days for the environmental regulator to approve this request.

data.name: InviteChangePermissions.OnceTheyApprove
data.value: Once they’ve approved the request, you will be able to submit data. We’ll let you know when they’ve approved the request.
